title: Bibliography & Working Papers | Anton Ebsen
description: An overview of the economic research I follow, focusing on methodology and policy relevance.

hero.title: Working Papers I'm Following
hero.text: Here I list current working papers and academic articles that I find particularly interesting â€“ with short notes on their methodological contributions.

papers.title: The Global Financial Cycle
papers.author: Helene Rey (2013/2015)
papers.notes: Fundamental for understanding monetary autonomy. Methodologically interesting due to the use of dynamic factor models to isolate a global proxy for risk appetite.

papers.title: Central Bank Digital Currency: Central Banking 2.0?
papers.author: Bordo & Levin (2017)
papers.notes: One of the most cited sources on CBDC. Analyzed with a focus on how a digital currency can function as a new monetary anchor.

papers.title: Macroprudential Policy in a Low Interest Rate Environment
papers.author: Various
papers.notes: Focus on the interaction between traditional monetary policy and macroprudential tools. Particularly relevant for stress testing methodology.
